name: Metro Awakening
summary:
*Includes cross-buy on Rift

Dive into an action-packed adventure set in a post-apocalyptic world.
As a survivor in the Metro’s underground network, you’ll engage in fast-paced combat, outsmart enemies, and explore vast, dangerous tunnels. Scavenge for weapons, gear, and supplies as you face off against mutated creatures and rival factions. Stealth, strategy, and action define the experience in this atmospheric, first-person adventure.
